page.title: 02AGRICULTURAL COL. SPARSHOLT
page.content: The College of Agriculture is a farm which brings together students from a wide area to teach them about various aspects of agriculture.The courses they attend last from two to five years.In the engineering department the students learn how to maintain farm equipment like tractors,combine harvesters and other machines.The administration block is also in this area where they make sure the college runs smoothly.One of the main parts of the college is the horticultural department which includes a fruit garden,vegetable garden,school garden, layer beds and nursery stock.There is also a tropical green house which has lots of plants and trees from warmer climates.There are several green houses made of glass and polythene. These are there so students can learn about seeding and growing plants.
